para.text: Dolphin Smalltalk uses the notion of a Package to encapsulate the changes that you make to your development
so that they can be exported to disk and subsequently imported into another image. Normal exported package files have a .PAC suffix.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:14px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.46; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

para.text: , allows you access to the packages installed in your system.
